data.title: The Cannabist Company
data.text: With more than a decade of experience as one of the most trusted and experienced cannabis companies in the U.S., we are entering into the next decade as The Cannabist Company. This is more than a rebrand, this is a reemergence. In 2021, we introduced The Cannabist as our retail platform - a welcoming, uncomplicated and normalized shopping experience, with a passion and purpose for delivering a higher experience to anyone who walks in our doors regardless of where they are on their cannabis journey. The reality is, everyone here is a Cannabist and shares the same higher calling to create an accessible, equitable and connected cannabis industry. As Cannabists, we are helping to build the bridge to the future through a commitment to our communities, the power of the cannabis plant, and our teams.
